summary: TAKATA RECALL: TO DATE, THERE IS STILL NO REMEDY AVAILABLE. ARE THEY WAITING FOR MORE PEOPLE TO DIE? THE RECALL DATE OF THIS OPEN RECALL WAS IN FEBRUARY 2016, WHICH IS NEARLY A YEAR AGO. THIS FAILURE TO REMEDY THIS "SAFETY RISK"/DEADLY PROBLEM NEARLY NINE MONTHS DEFINITELY QUALIFIES AS A NOT BEING REMEDIED IN A TIMELY MANNER. PLEASE ADVISE.
